title: Gone
description: Is Charley crazy, delusional or dead?Follow her amazing, emotional journey and emerge into the battle with her nemesis – herself.This inspirational fantasy will take you into realms otherwise unknown, turning your world upside down while you’ll be wondering what is real and what is not. It’s an adventure, a mystery and an imaginative fairytale for adults.Gone was a story motivated by a true event.***Cover Design: Julie Elizabeth PowellSource Photo: Angel Feather Wing by taeya18 (Free Digital Photos)
author: Julie Elizabeth Powell
